The problem is that the Catalyst audit process has too many barriers, and the solution to the problem is to create a review form to check for accuracy and efficiency. f6_assessments.q1:
No idea what the end product will be (a website? A mobile app?) and so no idea what products will be offered. I cannot consider this proposal as a strong candidate in this challenge because very little information has been provided to gauge its progress and success.
According to the description, the proposal does not present evidence regarding blockchain knowledge. Relevant skills and experience required to make a recommendation as a reference or guide

In addition, the budget should be better explained and broken down into smaller and related parts of the development process, so that the community can also track the cost of the project.
